meanings.definition: A person skilled in the art of fencing or sword fighting.
meanings.sent1: The swordsmen practiced their moves diligently at the fencing academy.
meanings.sent2: The swordsmen displayed their expertise in a thrilling sword fight.
meanings.sent3: The swordsmen decided to have a friendly competition to see who was the best fencer.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, negotiation skills are as important as the agility of swordsmen.
meanings.sent5: The image of the swordsmen dueling under the moonlight was etched in his memory.
